synonyms: sannyāsī—in the renounced order of life; nāma-mātra—in name only; mahā-indrajālī—first-class magician; kāśīpure—in Kāśī; nā vikābe—will not sell; tāṅra—His; bhāvakāli—sentimental activities.
translation: "This Caitanya is a sannyāsī in name only. Actually He is a first-class magician. In any case, His sentimentalism cannot be very much in demand here in Kāśī.
